abid.title: "Quarto" should be assigned "S" for Mudd locations.

approvals.title: User on Active Staff List not found in Approvals application.

comments.body:
@rladdusaw and I looked at this a bit. The daily report processing also parses and loads data from the "Balances for employees in Absence Management". The user who is not being loaded is not part of the absence management system so does not have an entry in this file. The loading process is possibility failing because of this condition. Reviewing the code to load a new user is probably the place to look first. 

If this is the cause a potential fix would be to look at the column "Absence System Code" in the active daily staff report. If a user has a value of "OT" in this column they will NOT be found in the absence management report and you can assume they have zero balances for the leave types. All other users will have the "AM" code.

bibdata.title: Add Lewis as a pick up location for Plasma Physics #2043

comments.body:
Waiting for Alma policies to be updated '[to allow holds to be placed on lewis for plasma materials](https://pulibrary.slack.com/archives/C034AS0QPC7/p1680179400757819)'

@mzelesky @pmgreen please follow up when the Alma part is done.

bibdata.title: Add Lewis as a Pick-up Option for Plasma Physics Items

comments.body: As it stands in the sandbox config: - Lewis circ desk has a hold shelf and (under 'Relationships') is configured to circulate for all (libraries) - PPPL is configured to deliver to all (libraries) (also tried a relationship explicitly delivering to Lewis) - There's an experimental Requests rule in the General FU called 'PPPL request rule' pointing to a new Requests TOU called 'PPPL Requests' that allows for `Pickup - Anywhere` (rather than the default of `Must pickup in owning library`) - Example request is still failing with `There was a problem with this request which Library staff need to investigate. You'll be notified once it's resolved and requested for you.`: https://catalog-qa.princeton.edu/requests/99122372723506421?aeon=false&mfhd=22573090520006421 - Through Alma, the request seems to be successful:

@pmgreen I should have mentioned that https://catalog-qa.princeton.edu/requests/99122372723506421?aeon=false&mfhd=22573090520006421 is pointing Alma production. 

catalog-staging is pointing the Alma sandbox https://catalog-staging.princeton.edu/requests/99122372723506421?aeon=false&mfhd=22573090520006421 but as far as I remember in general we cannot place a request though catalog-staging against the alma sandbox.

@pmgreen thanks for checking . I checked again my library card in the alma sandbox and I can see my request with pick library Lewis.
![Screenshot 2023-03-30 at 1 18 18 PM](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/9905193/228914809-5b3abff3-3e6d-498d-9900-aae01ea89059.png)

figgy.title: Calculate checksums for intermediate files during characterization
Local fixity only runs on primary file

comments.body: Re-ran characterization on FileSets with both Preservation and Intermediate files. There are currently **1541** of these in Figgy.
Looks like large server uploads use up the open file limit, and also uses up local disk space. Will have to look at that.

orangelight.title: Availability should use ARIA Live regions on the Show Page

comments.body: Closing this issue.  There is already an "Availability" heading that makes the availability section relatively prominent.  An aria live region could be potentially confusing, and there is no way for the user to repeat the unexpected message if they wanted to hear it again.

pdc_discovery.title: Make sure reindex is scheduled only in one server

comments.body:
We decided to update the reindex task so that it does not delete all documents before it starts since this is not needed anymore. 

We might want to preserve a rake task to delete all documents and use it in case we really need to blow everything away and reindex, but not use this tasks on a regular basis.

Screen shot of this feature with the full PDC Describe JSON exposed for harvesting:
![Screenshot 2023-03-30 at 11 30 15 AM](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/65608/228897298-6cf579f2-6313-4de9-bc9f-9c55e8e2ae9d.png)
